text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Patrick County VA Students and businesses Need high speed Internet.This is America! We should have broadband Internet.Our children cant attend school due to Covid19 and need reliable high speed Internet. It’s 2020 and we’re fundraising $50K for study to compete for grants.
